name: Bee Hero
description:
There was once a family of lovely bees happily eating their wonderful
honey, until... One dreadfully, unfortunate day, all the flowers died
and there wasn’t nearly enough pollen near their home to make a drop
of honey. So, to save all it’s family’s lives, the bravest bee had to
go far away to collect all the pollen it can get. But it is dangerous
out there, as the mosquitos have claimed this far away territory.
What they did not know was that the mosquitos will attack even if the
bee came in peace. The brave bee had to save its family so it went on
the long and dangerous journey. All I can say is   Bee Hero!
